metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where properties.timeCreated > {vmcreation:value}
| extend OS= tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)
| project id = tolower(tostring(id)), powerstate = strcat(split(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.code, '/')[1])
| extend env = "Azure"
| union (Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend powerstate = tostring(properties.status)
| project id = tolower(tostring(id)), powerstate
| extend env = "Arc")
| where powerstate in~ ({PowerStatus})
| join (guestconfigurationresources
    | where type == "microsoft.guestconfiguration/guestconfigurationassignments"
    | where name in ({GCPolicy})
    | extend lastCheckUTC = properties.lastComplianceStatusChecked
    | where lastCheckUTC < {not_reported_for:value}
    | extend ComplianceStatus = properties.complianceStatus
    | where ComplianceStatus in ({ComplianceStatus})
    | where ComplianceStatus != {include_pending}
    | extend id = tolower(tostring(properties.targetResourceId))
     //| extend lastCheckUTC = format_datetime(todatetime(properties.lastComplianceStatusChecked), 'yyyy-M-dd [H:mm:ss]')
    | extend AssignmentName = properties.latestAssignmentReport.assignment.name
    | extend GCName = properties.guestConfiguration.name
    | extend contentHash = properties.guestConfiguration.contentHash
    | extend contentUri = properties.guestConfiguration.contentUri
    | extend ReportID = properties.latestReportId
    | extend Computer = properties.targetResourceId
    | extend Success = countof(tostring(properties.latestAssignmentReport.resources), '"complianceStatus":"true"')
    | extend Failed = countof(tostring(properties.latestAssignmentReport.resources), '"complianceStatus":"false"')
    | extend ReportID = split(ReportID, "/reports/",0)[0]
    | extend ReportID = replace("/", "%2F", tostring(ReportID))
    | extend ReportURL = strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/ResourceMenuBlade/id/", ReportID)
    | extend ChecksFailedPercentage = (100.00 / (Success + Failed)) * Failed
    | extend ChecksSuccessPercentage = (100.00 / (Success + Failed)) * Success
    | extend ChecksFailed = strcat(Failed," of ",(Success + Failed )," | ", round(ChecksFailedPercentage,1),"%" )
    ) on id
| project  tostring(subscriptionId), resourceGroup = tostring(Computer), tostring(Computer), GCName, Name=name, ComplianceStatus, ChecksFailed, ChecksFailedPercentage, ChecksSuccessPercentage, lastCheck = lastCheckUTC, ReportURL
| sort by tostring(GCName) asc

| where type == "microsoft.guestconfiguration/guestconfigurationassignments"
| where name in ({GCPolicy})
| extend  ComplianceStatus = tostring(properties.complianceStatus)
| extend id = tolower(tostring(properties.targetResourceId))
| join  kind = leftouter (
    Resources
    | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines' or type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
    | extend azname = iff(type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines', name, "null")
    | where azname !startswith "{AzureexcludePrefix1}"
    | where azname !startswith "{AzureexcludePrefix2}"
    | extend arcname = iff(type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', name, "null")
    | where arcname !startswith "{ArcexcludePrefix1}"
    | where arcname !startswith "{ArcexcludePrefix2}"
    | where tostring(properties.storageProfile.imageReference.offer) !in ({AzureOffer2exclude}) and tostring(properties.osSku) !in ({ArcSKU2exclude})
    | extend OS = iff(isnotempty(tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)),  tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType),tostring(properties.osType))
    | project id = tolower(tostring(id)), OS
)  on id
| where isnotempty(id1)
| summarize Compliant=countif(ComplianceStatus=="Compliant"),NonCompliant=countif(ComplianceStatus=="NonCompliant"), Pending=countif(ComplianceStatus=="Pending")  by  name, detectedOS=toupper(OS)
| extend VMscount = iff(detectedOS == "WINDOWS", {windowsazure} + {windowsarc}, iff(detectedOS == "LINUX", {linuxazure} + {linuxarc}, -1 ) )
| extend percentageReported = round(Compliant*1.0/(Compliant+NonCompliant)*100 ,2)
| extend percentageNonReported = round(NonCompliant*1.0/(Compliant+NonCompliant)*100 ,2)
| extend ReceivedReports = strcat(Compliant," of ",Compliant+NonCompliant," | ", percentageReported," %")
| extend VMsnotReported = VMscount-(Compliant+NonCompliant+Pending)
| extend percentageCompliant = round(Compliant*1.0/VMscount*100,2)
| extend percentageNonCompliant = round(NonCompliant*1.0/VMscount*100,2)
| extend percentagePending = round(Pending*1.0/VMscount*100,2)
| extend percentageNotReported = round(VMsnotReported*1.0/VMscount*100,2)
| extend Compliance = strcat(Compliant," of ",VMscount," | ", percentageCompliant," %")
| extend VMsnotReported = VMscount-(Compliant+NonCompliant+Pending)
| extend ReportsGraph = ""
